pages.text: I've been able to squeeze out a whole lot more from my foods by cutting them up first, ensuring I use only as much of an ingredient as is really necessary.$(br2)Slaughtering with the knife has also yielded much better cuts of meat.

pages.title: Big Knife for Fat Pig
pages.text: I've ran out of food and it seems my flimsy knife just doesn't cut it anymore. Heheh. I need something bigger if I want to kill these Nether Pigs, so I've crafted a bigger knife! This machete cuts through these Hogs like butter!
